Judul: A Formal Approach to Software Synthesis for Architectural Platforms
Abstrak:
Software-intensive systems today often rely on middleware
platforms as major building blocks. As such, the architectural choices of such systems are being driven to a significant extent by such platforms. However, the diversity
and rapid evolution of these platforms lead to architectural
choices quickly becoming obsolete. Yet architectural choices
are among the most difficult to change. This paper presents
a novel and formal approach to end-to-end transformation of
application models into architecturally correct code, averting the problem of mapping application models to such architectural platforms.
